title: 3D Virtual Environment Collaborative Learning Design: Avatar-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic math concepts (equations, geometry) and foundational mobile device operation skills
context.additional_context: Process where professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields collaborate in a virtual space to solve complex mathematical problems. Emphasizes interaction using avatars in a smartphone-based 3D environment.

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems (e.g., spatial geometry) with 80% accuracy through real-time collaboration with peers using avatars in 3D virtual environments
Learners can visualize mathematical concepts using virtual tools (3D modeling, measurement devices) and explain them to peers
Learners can organize role distribution according to the collaborative framework (ABC) and complete over three group projects within four weeks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
